thread.section_title: MobileZap Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MobileZap | mobilezap.com.au
thread.title: Maranatha777

author: Maranatha777
title: Maranatha777
text:
There were several choices for the Moto G 3rd generation and bought a few cases while trying to get the best fit but without success.
Eventually I decided to purchase this one based on the reviews I saw.
I like the gloss appearance, and the case looks classy and fits very well. There is easy access to the ports, and the control buttons work very well with the case
It's made of high quality material and is both flexible and rigid enough in the right places to easily slip onto the phone while still fitting tightly.
The case finish makes the phone easy to grip and is as simple as can be design wise but that's exactly my preference.
Overall a great case to have to protect your Moto G3.
I am not a paid reviewer and I did not receive a discount or preferential treatment for writing this review. I just like to share my experience as this case deserves a top mark.
